text: QBasic is a programming language made by Microsoft which was included with Windows 95 and MS-DOS. QBasic is a more limited version of QuickBasic, released in 1985. While today considered almost obsolete, it is still a popular language for beginners and especially for educational purposes. == Example == An example Hello World program in QBasic: PRINT "Hello, World!" ==References== Category:Programming languages
title: QBasic
